General.Name: Pure Cycle Corporation
General.Description: Pure Cycle Corporation provides wholesale water and wastewater services in the United States. It operates in two segments, Wholesale Water and Wastewater Services; and Land Development. The company engages in the wholesale water production, storage, treatment, and distribution systems; wastewater collection and treatment systems; development of master-planned community; and construction and leasing of single-family homes. It serves domestic, commercial, and industrial customers. The company was incorporated in 1976 and is based in Watkins, Colorado.
General.Address: 34501 E. Quincy Avenue, Watkins, CO, United States, 80137
